content.text:
# Draft:List of awards and nominations received by V (singer)

References
List of awards and nominations received by V (singer)
South Korean singer V (real name Kim Taehyung), a member of BTS, has received multiple awards and nominations for his solo music, acting, and popularity since launching his solo career. **He is the first BTS member to win Daesang (Grand Prize) awards as a soloist.** Below is a list of his major recognitions.
2023
* **Melon Music Awards** – Best Male Solo – *Nominated*
* **Circle Chart Music Awards** – Artist of the Year (Digital Music - September) – *Won*
* **MAMA Awards** – Best Vocal Performance Solo – *Nominated*
* **Hanteo Music Awards** – Global Artist (Solo) – *Won*
2024
* **The Fact Music Awards** – Fan N Star Choice (Solo) – *Won*
* **Asia Artist Awards** – Best Musician (Solo) – *Won*
* **Golden Disc Awards** – Digital Bonsang – *Nominated*
* **Korean Brand of the Year** – Male Solo Artist – *Won*
See also
* V (singer)
* BTS (band)
